verses.verse: These are the words <S%H1697><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to all Israel <S%H3478><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> in the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Suph, <S%H5489><s%> between Paran, <S%H6290><s%> and Tophel, <S%H8603><s%> and Laban, <S%H3837><s%> and Hazeroth, <S%H2698><s%> and Dizahab. <S%H1774><s%>
It is eleven <S%H259><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey from Horeb <S%H2722><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> to Kadesh Barnea. <S%H6947><s%>

It happened in the fortieth <S%H705><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> according to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had given him in commandment to them; <S%H6680><s%>

after <S%H310><s%> he had struck <S%H5221><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Ashtaroth, <S%H6252><s%> at Edrei. <S%H154><s%>

Beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> began <S%H2974><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to declare <S%H874><s%> this law, <S%H8451><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to us in Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> You have lived <S%H3427><s%> long enough <S%H7227><s%> in this mountain: <S%H2022><s%>

turn, <S%H6437><s%> and take your journey, <S%H5265><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> to the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and to all the places near <S%H7934><s%> there, <S%H6160><s%> in the Arabah, in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H8219><s%> and in the lowland, and in the South, <S%H5045><s%> and by the <S%H3220><s%> seashore, <S%H2348><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> as far as the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates. <S%H6578><s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: <S%H935><s%> go in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to them and to their seed <S%H2233><s%> after them. <S%H310><s%>"
I spoke <S%H559><s%> to you at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> you myself alone: <S%H905><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has multiplied <S%H7235><s%> you, <S%H3117><s%> and behold, you are this day as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> make you a thousand <S%H505><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> as many as <S%H3254><s%> you are, <S%H1288><s%> and bless you, <S%H1696><s%> as he has promised you!
How <S%H349><s%> can I myself alone bear <S%H5375><s%> your encumbrance, <S%H2960><s%> and your burden, <S%H4853><s%> and your strife? <S%H7379><s%>

Take <S%H3051><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of understanding <S%H995><s%> and well known <S%H3045><s%> according to your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and I will make <S%H7760><s%> them heads over you. <S%H7218><s%>"
You answered <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H559><s%> and said, "The thing <S%H1697><s%> which you have spoken <S%H559><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> to do. <S%H6213><s%>"

So I took <S%H3947><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> and known, <S%H3045><s%> and made <S%H5414><s%> them heads <S%H7218><s%> over you, <S%H8269><s%> captains of thousands, <S%H505><s%> and captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> and captains <S%H8269><s%> of fifties, <S%H2572><s%> and captains <S%H8269><s%> of tens, <S%H6235><s%> and officers, <S%H7860><s%> according to your tribes. <S%H7626><s%>

I commanded <S%H6680><s%> your judges <S%H8199><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Hear <S%H8085><s%> cases between your brothers, <S%H251><s%> and judge <S%H8199><s%> righteously <S%H6664><s%> between a man <S%H376><s%> and his brother, <S%H251><s%> and the foreigner who is living with him. <S%H1616><s%>

You shall not show <S%H6440><s%> partiality <S%H5234><s%> in judgment; <S%H4941><s%> you shall hear <S%H8085><s%> the small <S%H6996><s%> and the great <S%H1419><s%> alike; <S%H1481><s%> you shall not be afraid of the face <S%H6440><s%> of man; <S%H376><s%> for the judgment <S%H4941><s%> is God <S%H430><s%>'s. The case <S%H1697><s%> that is too hard <S%H7185><s%> for you, <S%H7126><s%> you shall bring to me, <S%H8085><s%> and I will hear it."
I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you at that time <S%H6256><s%> all the things <S%H1697><s%> which you should do. <S%H6213><s%>

We traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> and went through <S%H3212><s%> all that great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%> which you saw, <S%H7200><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> to the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us; <S%H935><s%> and we came to Kadesh Barnea. <S%H6947><s%>
I said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H935><s%> "You have come to the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> gives to us. <S%H5414><s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has set <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: <S%H5927><s%> go up, take possession, <S%H3423><s%> as Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you; <S%H3372><s%> don't be afraid, neither be dismayed. <S%H2865><s%>"

You came near <S%H7126><s%> to me everyone of you, <S%H559><s%> and said, "Let us send <S%H7971><s%> men <S%H582><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us, <S%H2658><s%> that they may search the land <S%H776><s%> for us, <S%H7725><s%> and bring us word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%> by which we must go up, <S%H5927><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> to which we shall come. <S%H935><s%>"
The thing <S%H1697><s%> pleased me well; <S%H3190><s%> and I took <S%H3947><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of you, <S%H259><s%> one man <S%H582><s%> for every tribe: <S%H376><s%>
and they turned <S%H6437><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> into the hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H935><s%> and came to the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> and spied it out. <S%H7270><s%>

They took <S%H3947><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> in their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and brought it down <S%H3381><s%> to us, <S%H7725><s%> and brought us word <S%H1697><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "It is a good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> gives to us. <S%H5414><s%>"
Yet you wouldn't <S%H14><s%> go up, <S%H5927><s%> but rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%>

and you murmured <S%H7279><s%> in your tents, <S%H168><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hated <S%H8135><s%> us, <S%H3318><s%> he has brought us forth out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to deliver <S%H5414><s%> us into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> to destroy us. <S%H8045><s%>

Where are we going up? <S%H5927><s%> our brothers <S%H251><s%> have made our heart <S%H3824><s%> to melt, <S%H4549><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5971><s%> 'The people are greater <S%H1419><s%> and taller <S%H7311><s%> than we; <S%H5892><s%> the cities are great <S%H1419><s%> and fortified up <S%H1219><s%> to the sky; <S%H8064><s%> and moreover we have seen <S%H7200><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakim there. <S%H6062><s%>'"
Then I said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H6206><s%> "Don't dread, neither be afraid of them. <S%H3372><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> who goes <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H3898><s%> he will fight for you, <S%H6213><s%> according to all that he did for you in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%>

and in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> where you have seen <S%H7200><s%> how that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> bore <S%H5375><s%> you, <S%H376><s%> as a man does bear <S%H5375><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> in all the way <S%H1870><s%> that you went, <S%H1980><s%> until you came <S%H935><s%> to this place. <S%H4725><s%>"
Yet in this thing <S%H1697><s%> you didn't <S%H539><s%> believe Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%>

who went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you in the way, <S%H1870><s%> to seek you out <S%H8446><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> to pitch your tents <S%H2583><s%> in, <S%H784><s%> in fire by night, <S%H3915><s%> to show <S%H7200><s%> you by what way <S%H1870><s%> you should go, <S%H3212><s%> and in the cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day. <S%H3119><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words, <S%H1697><s%> and was angry, <S%H7107><s%> and swore, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Surely not one <S%H376><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%> of this evil <S%H7451><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%>

except <S%H2108><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh: <S%H3312><s%> he shall see <S%H7200><s%> it; <S%H5414><s%> and to him will I give the land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he has trodden on, <S%H1869><s%> and to his children, <S%H1121><s%> because he has wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"
Also Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with me for your sakes, <S%H1558><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "You also shall not go <S%H935><s%> in there: <S%H8033><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> who stands <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H935><s%> he shall go in there: <S%H2388><s%> encourage you him; <S%H3478><s%> for he shall cause Israel to inherit it. <S%H5157><s%>

Moreover your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> whom you said <S%H559><s%> should be a prey, <S%H957><s%> and your children, <S%H1121><s%> who this day <S%H3117><s%> have no knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%> or evil, <S%H7451><s%> they shall go in <S%H935><s%> there, <S%H5414><s%> and to them will I give it, <S%H3423><s%> and they shall possess it.
But as for you, <S%H6437><s%> turn, and take your journey <S%H5265><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>"

Then you answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H2398><s%> "We have sinned against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> we will go up <S%H5927><s%> and fight, <S%H3898><s%> according to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us. <S%H376><s%>" Every man of you put <S%H2296><s%> on his weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> and presumed <S%H1951><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> into the hill country. <S%H2022><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> "Tell them, <S%H5927><s%> 'Don't go up, neither fight; <S%H3898><s%> for I am not among <S%H7130><s%> you; <S%H5062><s%> lest you be struck before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies. <S%H341><s%>'"

So I spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you, <S%H8085><s%> and you didn't listen; but you rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and were presumptuous, <S%H2102><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up <S%H5927><s%> into the hill country. <S%H2022><s%>

The Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in that hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H3318><s%> came out against <S%H7125><s%> you, <S%H7291><s%> and chased you, <S%H1682><s%> as bees do, <S%H6213><s%> and beat <S%H3807><s%> you down in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> even to Hormah. <S%H2767><s%>

You returned <S%H7725><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to your voice, <S%H6963><s%> nor gave ear to you. <S%H238><s%>
So you stayed <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> according to the days <S%H3117><s%> that you remained. <S%H3427><s%>
